import React from 'react'; import './Play.css'; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const Play = () => { // Function to handle slider value change const handleSliderChange = (event, setStateFunction) => { console.log(event.target.value) setStateFunction(Number(event.target.value)); console.log("numcards", numCards); }; const [currentUrl, setCurrentUrl] = useState(''); const [showRules, setShowRules] = useState(false); const [numCards, setNumCards] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { // Update the currentUrl state with the current window URL setCurrentUrl(window.location.href); }, []); const handleCopy = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(currentUrl); }; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleStartGame = () => { setShowRules(true); }; return (
{showRules ? (

); } export default Play;
